features: REAL RESULTS: Take your skincare regimen to the next level with refreshing sheet mask four packs. Activated by natural superfoods, these moisturizing facial masks provide targeted skin solutions to reveal that healthy, dewy glow all ladies crave.
FINELY SPUN SHEETS: Feel spa-like luxury in the comfort of your own home. Each peel off face mask is made from a bio-cellulose material that feels absolutely divine on your skin.
DEEP MOISTURE: The anti aging face mask utilizes crisp cucumber extract to infuse your skin with a healthy dose of vitamin C for an extra boost of hydration and to help remedy dry skin.

HOW TO USE: First, cleanse your skin. Take mask out and unfold completely. Remove one layer of the protective mesh, and place the exposed side of the mask on your face. Smooth with hands, then remove the other sheet of mesh. Leave on for 20–25 minutes for the best results. Remove the mask, then gently massage any remaining serum into the skin.

THE FARMACY WAY: Our goal is simple. We want to bring out the best version of your radiant self with the best possible, naturally derived ingredients. Each women's skincare and beauty product we craft uses cutting-edge science to harness the healing powers of ingredients that Mother Nature has been so kind as to provide for us.
body.description: About the Face Mask Each Farmacy face mask pairs coconut with a different superfood for real, targeted results. The Oil Control mask helps to normalize oily, problematic skin with lycopene, a natural phytochemical believed to help control the over-production of sebum. [21ml x 3] The sheet masks are made from a bio-cellulose material soft and comfortable on your skin as can be. Farmacy offers several different types of masks for all different skin types. About Farmacy Farmer Cultivated & Scientist Activated. We use cutting-edge science to harness the healing powers of ingredients found in nature. The result is farm-to-face skincare that lives up to its full potency and potential through clean, thoughtful formulas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These sheet masks are so nice and hydrating. They really penetrate the skin and leave it glowing and plump. Glad I got them

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Feels like getting a whole facial after it’s really light and moisturizing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of my favorite skincare brands made my favorite sheet mask
reviews.reviewText: I like the gel sheet masks over the traditional sheet masks- hands down! So much more moisturizing. I love the serum used, I will use the excess to rub on neck and chest.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Something off with either overall mask size or eye openings
reviews.reviewText: My long-time favorite mask is no longer available, so searching for a replacement. Will probably keep looking for a while. I look forward to being able to fit a mask directly in the undereye area which is what needs hydrating and soothing most. I can't do that with this mask, so end up having to add extra moisturizer in that area. Haven't had this issue with other biocellulose masks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use these at least twice a week. They help my face so much with the dryness of winter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels great on skin
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use, nice fragrance and lovely feeling on my face after using

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2023

reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Didn’t do anything.
reviews.reviewText: I couldn’t see any improvement in my skin.
